Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

11 
12  //0 is time
13  //1 is length
14  //2 is x component of guiding center
15  //3 is y component of guiding center
16  //4 is z component of guiding center
17  //5 is longitudinal momentum
18  //6 is transverse momentum
19  //7 is phase
20 
21  KSMagneticField* KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::fMagneticFieldCalculator = NULL;
22  KSElectricField* KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::fElectricFieldCalculator = NULL;
23  double KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::fMass = 0.;
24  double KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::fCharge = 0.;
25 
26  KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::KSTrajAdiabaticParticle() :
27  fTime( 0. ),
28  fLength( 0. ),
29  fPosition( 0., 0., 0. ),
30  fMomentum( 0., 0., 0. ),
31  fVelocity( 0., 0., 0. ),
32  fLorentzFactor( 0. ),
33  fKineticEnergy( 0. ),
34 
35  fMagneticField( 0., 0., 0. ),
36  fElectricField( 0., 0., 0. ),
37  fMagneticGradient( 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0. ),
38  fElectricPotential( 0. ),
39  fElectricPotentialRP( 0. ),
40 
41  fGuidingCenter( 0., 0., 0. ),
42  fLongMomentum( 0. ),
43  fTransMomentum( 0. ),
44  fLongVelocity( 0. ),
45  fTransVelocity( 0. ),
46  fCyclotronFrequency( 0. ),
47  fOrbitalMagneticMoment( 0. ),
48 
49  fAlpha( 0., 0., 0. ),
50  fBeta( 0., 0., 0. ),
51  fLastTime( 0.),
52  fLastPosition( 0., 0., 0. ),
53  fLastMomentum( 0., 0., 0. ),
54  fPhase( 0. ),
55 
56  fGetMagneticFieldPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticField ),
57  fGetElectricFieldPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricField ),
58  fGetMagneticGradientPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient ),
59  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient ),
60  fGetElectricPotentialPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential ),
61  fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotentialRP ),
62  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricFieldAndPotential )

73 
74  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::PullFrom( const KSParticle& aParticle )
75  {
76  trajmsg_debug( "adiabatic particle is pulling data from a particle..."<<eom);
77 
78  if( fMagneticFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator() )
79  {
80  trajmsg_debug( "...magnetic calculator differs" )
81  fMagneticFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator();
82 
83  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
84  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
85  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticFieldAndGradient;
86  }
87 
88  if( fElectricFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator() )
89  {
90  trajmsg_debug( "...electric calculator differs" )
91  fElectricFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator();
92 
93  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
94  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
95  fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotentialRP;
96  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricFieldAndPotential;
97  }
98 
99  if( GetMass() != aParticle.GetMass() )
100  {
101  trajmsg_debug( "...mass differs" )
102  fMass = aParticle.GetMass();
103  }
104 
105  if( GetCharge() != aParticle.GetCharge() )
106  {
107  trajmsg_debug( "...charge differs" )
108  fCharge = aParticle.GetCharge();
109  }
110 
111  if( fLastTime != aParticle.GetTime() || fLastPosition != aParticle.GetPosition() || fLastMomentum != aParticle.GetMomentum() )
112  {
113  fTime = aParticle.GetTime();
114  fLength = aParticle.GetLength();
115  fPosition = aParticle.GetPosition();
116  fMomentum = aParticle.GetMomentum();
117  fGuidingCenter = aParticle.GetGuidingCenterPosition();
118  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateField( fGuidingCenter, fTime, fMagneticField );
119 
120  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
121  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
122  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
123  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticFieldAndGradient;
124  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
125  fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotentialRP;
126  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricFieldAndPotential;
127 
128  KThreeVector tGyrationVector = fGuidingCenter - fPosition;
129  fAlpha = -1. * tGyrationVector.Unit();
130  fBeta = -1. * fMagneticField.Cross( tGyrationVector ).Unit();
131 
132  fData[ 0 ] = fTime;
133  fData[ 1 ] = fLength;
134  fData[ 2 ] = fGuidingCenter.X();
135  fData[ 3 ] = fGuidingCenter.Y();
136  fData[ 4 ] = fGuidingCenter.Z();
137 
138  //renormalize momentum magnitude, this is necessary because the electric potential can
139  //be different between the guiding center position and the particles true postion
140  //since we have been given the particle's momentum, we have to correct the guiding center
141  //momentum to account for this difference
142  double tMC2 = fMass*KConst::C()*KConst::C();
143  double tKineticEnergy = std::sqrt( fMomentum.MagnitudeSquared()*KConst::C()*KConst::C() + tMC2*tMC2 );
144  //calculate potential at particles position
145  double tRPPotential;
146  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( fPosition, fTime, tRPPotential );
147  //calulate potential at guiding center position
148  double tGCPotential;
149  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( fGuidingCenter, fTime, tGCPotential );
150  tKineticEnergy -= (tGCPotential - tRPPotential)*fCharge;
151 
152  //need to take absolute value of sqrt argument to prevent nan's
153  //if we are in a situation where the argument goes negative this probably means that
154  //the guiding center approximation is not valid in that region
155  double tMomentumMagnitude = (1.0/KConst::C())*std::sqrt( std::fabs( (tKineticEnergy - tMC2)*(tKineticEnergy + tMC2) ) );
156 
157  //TODO: Make sure we are not missing a correction term on the momentum due to difference in the magnetic
158  //vector potential between the g.c and particle position
159  fMomentum.SetMagnitude(tMomentumMagnitude);
160 
161  fData[ 5 ] = fMomentum.Dot( fMagneticField.Unit() );
162  // though mathematically the expression inside the square root is guaranteed to be equal or bigger than 0
163  // numerical errors can play us a trick and push it to negative values.
164  // fabs() is therefore necessary to prevent everything to go bogus in that case.
165  fData[ 6 ] = sqrt( fabs( (tMomentumMagnitude - fData[5])*(tMomentumMagnitude + fData[5]) ) );
166  fData[ 7 ] = 0.;
167 
168  trajmsg_debug( "**updating adiabatic particle:" << ret )
169  trajmsg_debug( " real position: " << GetPosition() << ret )
170  trajmsg_debug( " real momentum: " << GetMomentum() << ret )
171  trajmsg_debug( " gc position: " << GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
172  trajmsg_debug( " gc alpha: " << fAlpha << ret )
173  trajmsg_debug( " gc beta: " << fBeta << ret )
174  trajmsg_debug( " parallel momentum: <" << GetLongMomentum() << ">" << ret )
175  trajmsg_debug( " perpendicular momentum: <" << GetTransMomentum() << ">" << ret )
176  trajmsg_debug( " kinetic energy is: <" << GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
177 
178  }
179 
180  return;
181  }
182  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::PushTo( KSParticle& aParticle )
183  {
184  trajmsg_debug( "AdiabaticParticle is pushing to KSParticle"<<ret);
185  trajmsg_debug( " real position: " << GetPosition() << ret )
186  trajmsg_debug( " real momentum: " << GetMomentum() << ret )
187  trajmsg_debug( " gc position: " << GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
188  trajmsg_debug( " gc alpha: " << fAlpha << ret )
189  trajmsg_debug( " gc beta: " << fBeta << ret )
190  trajmsg_debug( " parallel momentum: <" << GetLongMomentum() << ">" << ret )
191  trajmsg_debug( " perpendicular momentum: <" << GetTransMomentum() << ">" << ret )
192  trajmsg_debug( " kinetic energy is: <" << GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
193 
194  fLastTime = GetTime();
195  fLastPosition = GetPosition();
196  fLastMomentum = GetMomentum();
197  aParticle.SetTime( fLastTime );
198  aParticle.SetPosition( fLastPosition );
199  aParticle.SetMomentum( fLastMomentum );
200  aParticle.SetLength( GetLength() );
201  if( fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing )
202  {
203  aParticle.SetElectricPotential( GetElectricPotentialRP() );
204  }
205  fData[ 7 ] = fmod( fData[ 7 ], 2. * KConst::Pi() ); // you have to keep doing this to keep numerical precision in the angular variable
206 
207  return;
208  }
209

216  fMagneticFieldCalculator = anMagneticField;

221  return fMagneticFieldCalculator;
222  }

225  {
226  fElectricFieldCalculator = anElectricField;
227  return;

230  {
231  return fElectricFieldCalculator;
232  }

239  {
240  fMass = aMass;
241  return;

243  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetMass()
244  {
245  return fMass;
246  }
247 
248  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::SetCharge( const double& aCharge )
249  {
250  fCharge = aCharge;
251  return;
252  }
253  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetCharge()
254  {
255  return fCharge;
256  }

258  //*****************
259  //dynamic variables
260  //*****************
261 
262  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetTime() const
263  {
264  fTime = fData[ 0 ];
265  return fTime;
266  }
267  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetLength() const
268  {
269  fLength = fData[ 1 ];
270  return fLength;
271  }
272  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetPosition() const
273  {
274  double tSigma = GetCharge() / fabs( GetCharge() );
275  fPosition = GetGuidingCenter() + (fData[ 6 ] / (fabs( GetCharge() ) * GetMagneticField().Magnitude())) * (cos( tSigma * fData[ 7 ] ) * fAlpha + sin( tSigma * fData[ 7 ] ) * fBeta);
276  return fPosition;
277  }
278  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetMomentum() const
279  {
280  double tPhi = GetElectricPotentialRP() - GetElectricPotential();
281 
282  double tSigma = GetCharge() / fabs( GetCharge() );
283  fMomentum = fData[ 5 ] * GetMagneticField().Unit() - fData[ 6 ] * tSigma * (-sin( tSigma * fData[ 7 ] ) * fAlpha + cos( tSigma * fData[ 7 ] ) * fBeta);
284 
285  double tPM = GetMass() * KConst::C();
286  double tPPhi = (GetCharge() * tPhi) / KConst::C();
287  double tPGC = sqrt( fData[ 5 ] * fData[ 5 ] + fData[ 6 ] * fData[ 6 ] );
288 
289  //need to take absolute value of sqrt argument to prevent nan's
290  //if we are in a situation where the argument goes negative this probably means that
291  //the guiding center approximation is not valid in that region
292  double tPR = sqrt( std::fabs( tPGC * tPGC + tPPhi * tPPhi - 2. * tPPhi * sqrt( tPGC * tPGC + tPM * tPM ) ) );
293 
294  //TODO: Make sure we are not missing a correction term on the momentum due to difference in the magnetic
295  //vector potential between the g.c and particle position
296 
297  fMomentum.SetMagnitude( tPR );
298 
299  return fMomentum;
300  }
301  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetVelocity() const
302  {
303  fVelocity = (1. / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor())) * GetMomentum();
304  return fVelocity;
305  }
306  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetLorentzFactor() const
307  {
308  fLorentzFactor = sqrt( 1. + (GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared()) / (GetMass() * GetMass() * KConst::C() * KConst::C()) );
309  return fLorentzFactor;
310  }
311  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetKineticEnergy() const
312  {
313  fKineticEnergy = (GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared()) / ((1. + GetLorentzFactor()) * GetMass());
314  return fKineticEnergy;
315  }
316 
317  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetMagneticField() const
318  {
319  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldPtr)();
320  return fMagneticField;
321  }
322  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::SetMagneticField( const KThreeVector& aField ) const
323  {
324  fMagneticField = aField;
325  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
326  }
327  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetElectricField() const
328  {
329  (this->*fGetElectricFieldPtr)();
330  return fElectricField;
331  }
332  const KThreeMatrix& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetMagneticGradient() const
333  {
334  (this->*fGetMagneticGradientPtr)();
335  return fMagneticGradient;
336  }
337  const std::pair<const KThreeVector&, const KThreeMatrix&> KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetMagneticFieldAndGradient() const
338  {
339  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr)();
340  return std::make_pair(fMagneticField, fMagneticGradient );
341  }
342  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetElectricPotential() const
343  {
344  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialPtr)();
345  return fElectricPotential;
346  }
347  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetElectricPotentialRP() const
348  {
349  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr)();
350  return fElectricPotentialRP;
351  }
352  const std::pair<const KThreeVector&, const double&> KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetElectricFieldAndPotential() const
353  {
354  (this->*fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr)();
355  return std::make_pair(fElectricField, fElectricPotential );
356  }
357 
358  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetGuidingCenter() const
359  {
360  fGuidingCenter.SetComponents( fData[ 2 ], fData[ 3 ], fData[ 4 ] );
361  return fGuidingCenter;
362  }
363  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetLongMomentum() const
364  {
365  fLongMomentum = fData[ 5 ];
366  return fLongMomentum;
367  }
368  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetTransMomentum() const
369  {
370  fTransMomentum = fData[ 6 ];
371  return fTransMomentum;
372  }
373  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetLongVelocity() const
374  {
375  fLongVelocity = fData[ 5 ] / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
376  return fLongVelocity;
377  }
378  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetTransVelocity() const
379  {
380  fTransVelocity = fData[ 6 ] / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
381  return fTransVelocity;
382  }
383  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetCyclotronFrequency() const
384  {
385  fCyclotronFrequency = (fabs( fCharge ) * GetMagneticField().Magnitude()) / (2. * KConst::Pi() * GetLorentzFactor() * GetMass());
386  return fCyclotronFrequency;
387  }
388  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetOrbitalMagneticMoment() const
389  {
390  fOrbitalMagneticMoment = (fData[ 6 ] * fData[ 6 ]) / (2. * GetMagneticField().Magnitude() * GetMass());
391  return fOrbitalMagneticMoment;
392  }
393

395  {
396  fAlpha = anAlpha;
397  return;

400  {
401  return fAlpha;

405  {

410  {
411  return fBeta;
412  }
413 
414  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::SetPhase( const double& aPhase )
415  {
416  fPhase = aPhase;
417  return;
418  }
419  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::GetPhase() const
420  {
421  fPhase = fData[ 7 ];
422  return fPhase;
423  }

426  //*****
427  //cache
428  //*****
429 
430  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing() const
431  {
432  return;
433  }
434  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticField() const
435  {
436  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fMagneticField );
437  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
438  return;
439  }
440  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricField() const
441  {
442  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fElectricField );
443  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
444  return;
445  }
446  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient() const
447  {
448  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateGradient( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fMagneticGradient );
449  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
450  return;
451  }
452  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateMagneticFieldAndGradient() const
453  {
454  //first check if either the magfield or the gradient are already cached
455  //if one is cached, execute the function pointer of the other
456  if ( fGetMagneticFieldPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing )
457  {
458  (this->*fGetMagneticGradientPtr)();
459  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
460  return;
461  }
462  if ( fGetMagneticGradientPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing )
463  {
464  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldPtr)();
465  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
466  return;
467  }
468 
469  //if none is cached, calculate both at once
470  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateFieldAndGradient( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fMagneticField, fMagneticGradient );
471  fGetMagneticFieldAndGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
472  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
473  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
474  return;
475  }
476  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential() const
477  {
478  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fElectricPotential );
479  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
480  return;
481  }
482  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricPotentialRP() const
483  {
484  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricPotentialRP );
485  fGetElectricPotentialRPPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
486  return;
487  }
488  void KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::RecalculateElectricFieldAndPotential() const
489  {
490  //first check if either the electric field or the potential are already cached
491  //if one is cached, execute the function pointer of the other
492  if ( fGetElectricFieldPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing )
493  {
494  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialPtr)();
495  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
496  return;
497  }
498  if ( fGetElectricPotentialPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing )
499  {
500  (this->*fGetElectricFieldPtr)();
501  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
502  return;
503  }
504 
505  //if none is cached, calculate both at once
506  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateFieldAndPotential( GetGuidingCenter(), GetTime(), fElectricField, fElectricPotential );
507  fGetElectricFieldAndPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
508  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
509  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticParticle::DoNothing;
510  return;
511  }
512 
513 } /* namespace Kassiopeia */
